linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 11
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10
  • Processor: 2007 or later
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DIA Geforce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 11
  • Processor: 2007 or later
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DIA Geforce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: The Pane Puzzle Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable

short_description: Layer and match colored tiles to restore pictures in The Pane Puzzle. Simple at first, but it gets tricky as you progress!
supported_languages: English, French, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
